title: What do the different indicator colors mean?
answer:
The phone's status indicators can show battery status or event notifications. 

 Red flashing: low battery; battery over-discharged and cannot re-charge; phone will not switch on. 

 Red light (while charging): battery charge is below the warning level. 

 Orange light (while charging): battery charge is above the warning level. 

 Green light (while charging): charging is complete or nearly complete. 

 Green flashing: new message; new email; missed call; calendar reminder; missed alarm. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=123031)

 For some third-party apps, the indicator may also flash green when there are new notifications.
keywords: status light, notification light, charging light, indicator
